project.name: nme-tiled
project.description: nme-tiled is a library, which gives NME developers the possibility to use the TILED Map Editor.
project.version: Changed License to MIT license, all attributes are now editable, added new Methods to TiledMap: createBitmapDataFromLayerID(int), createBitmapDataFromLayer(layer), createBitmapDataFromArray([layer1, layer2, ...]), createBitmapDataFromIntArray([0, 2, 1]) and createBitmapDataFromRange(1, 2), added haxedoc documentation to most public members
